WelcomePage.Title: Welcome to Knowte!
WelcomePage.Text: To begin using Knowte, please select a directory in which you want your notes to be saved. If you would like to import notes which you already have, just select the directory that has them and Knowte will import them for you.

AboutPage.IsKnowteUseful: Is Knowte useful? Please consider donating. Thank you!

DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteCollection: Are you sure you want to delete the collection {{collectionName}}? If you continue, its notebooks and notes will be lost.
DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteNote: Are you sure you want to delete the note {{noteTitle}}?

ErrorTexts.StorageDirectoryCreationError: The directory {{storageDirectory}} cannot be used to save your notes. You might not have sufficient permissions to create items in it. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.GlobalError: An error has occurred which will cause the application to close. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.AddCollectionError: An error occurred while adding the collection {{collectionName}}. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.AddNotebookError: An error occurred while adding the notebook {{notebookName}}. Please verify the log if you need more information.

SnackBarMessages.DuplicateCollection: There is already a collection with the name {{collectionName}}
SnackBarMessages.DuplicateNotebook: There is already a notebook with the name {{notebookName}}
SnackBarMessages.NoteDeleteBlocked: The note {{noteTitle}} was not deleted because it is open
